item.title: Times Internet spin-out Abound raises $14M to let more Indian Americans send money home
item.description: Abound, a go-to remittance app that was spun off by India's Times Internet, has raised $14 million in a seed round.

item.title: I Opted Out of AI Training. Does This Reduce My Future Influence?
item.description: WIRED’s advice columnist considers whether trying to remove your data and information from generative AI tools could lessen your impact on the technol...

item.title: Inside arXiv—the Most Transformative Platform in All of Science
item.description: Modern science wouldn’t exist without the online research repository known as arXiv. Three decades in, its creator still can’t let it go.

item.title: Hikaru Utada Would Rather Play CERN Than Coachella
item.description: The Japanese singer-songwriter’s new album goes deep on their “fascination with science.” WIRED Japan took Hikaru Utada to visit the Large Hadron Coll...

item.title: NHS vendor Advanced to pay £3M fine following 2022 ransomware attack
item.description: NHS vendor Advanced will pay just over £3 million ($3.8 million) in fines for not implementing basic security measures before it suffered a ransomware...
